required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of XZP-5955 Tablets in Patients With NTRK or ROS1 Fusion Positive Locally Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety Tolerability Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Efficacy of XZP-5955 Tablets in Patients With NTRK or ROS1 Gene Fusion Locally Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors in a Single-arm Open-label Multi-center Phase I/II Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: A phase I/II study to examine the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and efficacy of XZP-5955 tablets in patients with advanced solid tumors harboring NTRK or ROS1 gene fusion

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum tolerated dose (MTD) (Phase I dose escalation)
Number of patients with adverse events (Phase I dose escalation)
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of AE as assessed by CTCAE 5.0

primary_outcome.measure: Overall Response Rate (ORR) by Blinded Independent Central Review (BICR) (Phase I dose expansion and phase II)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
primary_outcome.description: Per RECIST v1.1 as assessed by BICR

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Area under the concentration versus time curve of XZP-5955 in plasma (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, up to 72h after drug on Day 1；pre-dose on day 8, day 15 of cycle 1, , pre-dose and up to 12h after drug on day21 of cycle 1;pre-dose on day1 of cycle 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the area under the plasma concentration time curve (AUC) of XZP-5955

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hours post dose of Day 1
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of XZP-5955

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase I: Oral clearance (CL/F) of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, up to 72h after drug on Day 1；pre-dose on day 8, day 15 of cycle 1, pre-dose and up to 12h after drug on day21 of cycle 1;pre-dose on day1 of cycle 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the oral clearance (CL/F) of XZP-5955

secondary_outcome.measure: objective response rate (ORR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the preliminary objective response rate (ORR) by investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression free survival (PFS) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the PFS by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of response (DOR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the DOR by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease control rate (DCR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the DOR by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical benefit rate (CBR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the CBR by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to response (TTR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the TTR by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Death of response (DpR) (Phase I and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the DpR by BICR and investigator

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival (OS) (Phase I expansion period and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955

secondary_outcome.measure: Intracranial objective response rate (Phase I expansion period and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.description: 2 to 3 years after first dose of XZP-5955

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events ((Phase I dose expansion and Phase II)
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of AE as assessed by CTCAE 5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Pop PK of XZP-5955 and its metabolite (Phase II)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, Tmax on Day1, pre-dose on day 8 of cycle 1, pre-dose on day 1 of Cycle 2, Tmax,ss on Day 1 of cycle 2, pre-dose on day 1 of cycle 3
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the PopPK characteristics of XZP-5955

clinical_study.condition: Locally Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
Locally Advanced or Metastatic Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

intervention.description: Phase I dose escalation: For each dose cohort, XZP-5955 tablet will be administered orally, single dose for day 1 and then from day 4, administered for continuous cycles of 21 consecutive days for each cycle Phase I dose expansion: XZP-5955 tablet will be administered orally, once daily for continuous cycles of 21 consecutive days for each cycle. Some patients for PK sample collection, the drug will be administered single dose for day 1, then from day 4, administered for continuous cycles of 21 consecutive days for each cycle Phase II: XZP-5955 tablet will be administered orally, once daily for continuous cycles of 21 consecutive days for each cycle

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: Cancer Hospital Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

clinical_study.keyword: Solid tumors with NTRK or ROS1 gene fusion
